backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement for enforcing a 5% margin on the breathing circle and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text listing summaries of various frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and styles defining light/dark color tokens and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and registering the PWA manifest and favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest providing app metadata, theme colors, and icons for installation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and layout with header, footer tabs, and route-aware UI behavior.
Breathing circle component rendering animated inhale/exhale states with optional progress ring.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Draws a simple line chart of breath-hold durations with points and date labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Shows a weekly bar chart of minutes spent, scaling bar heights relative to the max value.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing custom breathing pattern durations with four numeric fields.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Tappable exercise tile showing icon, title, description, and an info button.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Home-screen exercise card with start action and a dialog for changing duration.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders an SVG circular progress indicator split into segments and fills them based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Displays a table of past sessions with formatted dates and durations, or a message when empty.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: A vertical slider component for volume control with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Manages breathing cycle state, timing, voice guidance, vibration, and phase transitions for exercises.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibration helper using the browser's navigator API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Manages per-exercise duration settings with local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases screen wake lock based on an active flag to prevent device sleep.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, theme variables, and breathing animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls rain and waves audio playback with volume management and exclusive play modes.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines the BreathingPattern interface and exports preset breathing patterns.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Provides helpers to read and write breath-hold records, breathing sessions, and per‑exercise durations to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and enforces auto‑stop rules based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines types for breath‑hold records and breathing sessions with timestamps and durations.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Computes daily minutes, breath‑hold chart data, and extracts the last 10 breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Contains constant string keys used for localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Handles voice guidance via speech synthesis, offering volume control and async or queued speech functions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with app info, premium upsell section, and quick settings display.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to create and start a custom breathing pattern via a form.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays preset breathing exercises and a breath‑holding test, enabling navigation to the player.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player with pattern loading, duration validation, ambient audio, voice control, and auto‑stop logic.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders the Settings page with toggles for audio options, haptics, and notification preferences. Includes navigation back to home and uses multiple Card sections for grouped settings.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly minutes, breath-hold trends, and a table of recent sessions using stored session data. Fetches and formats local history for charts and tables on mount.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer that tracks elapsed time, saves results to local storage, and shows the all-time record. Provides start/stop controls and time formatting.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable PWA functionality. Handles success or failure silently.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme values, custom colors, and plugins. Adds responsive breakpoints, font settings, and semantic color tokens.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, description, and a catalog of implemented features with identifiers and versions. Outlines the app’s routing, breathing patterns, UI behaviors, and local persistence features.
